## taskToThirdPartyService variable

Defines a task which makes a HTTP requests to a third-party API (using an API key).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
taskToThirdPartyService: (config: TaskToThirdPartyService) => {
    parent: string;
    task: {
        name: string;
        httpRequest: {
            body: string;
            headers: {
                Authorization: string;
                'Content-Type': string;
                'X-Task-Enqueued-By': string;
            };
            httpMethod: "POST";
            url: string;
        };
        scheduleTime: {
            scheduleTimeInSeconds: number;
        };
        dispatchDeadline: {
            dispatchDeadlineInSeconds: number;
        };
    };
}
```
